title: 80BREAKING: California admits they illegally issued 17,000 non-domiciled Commercial Driver’s License
content:
80 BREAKING: California admits they illegally issued 17,000 non-domiciled Commercial Driver’s Licenses to “dangerous foreign drivers.”

Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says he’s revoking all of them. 🛑  Corrupt Commies  🛑 posted 3 hours ago by ALT26 4 comments award share report block Libs of TikTok @libsoftiktok • 4h BREAKING: California admits they illegally issued 17,000 non-domiciled Commercial Driver’s Licenses to “dangerous foreign drivers.” Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says he’s revoking all of them. Democrats gave CDLs to foreigners who don’t speak English or understand our
4 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save AllisterTwo 4 points 3 hours ago As a CDL holder, I have to wonder if the pay scale is about to jump due to demand... This is a perfect example of foreigners taking good paying American jobs away from Americans, they are not all landscapers and maids or doing jobs others don't want, they just work cheaper! permalink award report block reply Datamancer 1 points 3 hours ago Swell.  Now how exactly will you get them off the road? permalink award report block reply AllisterTwo 3 points 3 hours ago Seizing the trucks and cargo and auctioning it off as well as BIG fines on the companies seems like a good start... permalink parent award report block reply Pederella 1 points 3 hours ago Get all Weigh Stations and Inspection Stations opened.  Put Fed details at or near major truck stops. Give local leos a bounty payment, perhaps allow them any proceeds from sale of vehicle. If shipper doesn't claim their load, sell it, too. permalink parent award report block reply
